newsitem.title: GERMANY: GERMAN DATA DUE -- Sept M3 data due shortly.
newsitem.headline: GERMAN DATA DUE -- Sept M3 data due shortly.

text.p: The Bundesbank said on Monday it would release provisional German M3 money supply data for September at 0730 GMT.
Economists polled by Reuters expect September M3 growth to have slowed to an annualised, seasonally-adjusted rate of between 8.2 and 8.5 percent from 8.7 percent in August.
The Bundesbank's target range for 1996 M3 money supply growth is four percent to seven percent.
